Description.Name: Basic Attack: Saw Teeth Trimming
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to 3 attacks at enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Each attack consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

Description.Name: Dodge: Vortex
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A rapid dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, Ellen gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect, reducing the charge time of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, lasting up to 5 seconds or until it triggers.

Description.Name: Dash: Roaming Hunt
Description.Desc:
Hold or double-press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, allowing dashing movement.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to control Ellen's direction, and release to stop.
Ellen is invulnerable for a brief time after activation.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Delivers a spinning slash to enemies before opening her scissors for a Swift Scissors strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when the Swift Scissors strike hits.

While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against the enemy, then pull apart the scissors to unleash a Charged Scissors strike, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when the Charged Scissors strike hits. If the enemy is <color=#98EFF0>Frozen</color>, it always triggers <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging the skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Flash Freeze
Description.Desc: When Ellen has <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> effect is activated. Once <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> activates, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> expend <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. Ellen can have up to a maximum of 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Monstrous Wave
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Cold Snap
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during dodge to activate:
Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Reef Rock
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Rapidly move through enemies with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Param.Name: Swift Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained
Charged Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained

Description.Name: Special Attack: Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Use a quick tail sweep attack in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Perform a forceful tail whip attack that deals massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> upon striking an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd-hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Sharknami
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy and after executing <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Perform a powerful series of slashes ahead that deal massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> upon striking an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd-hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Avalanche
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Endless Winter
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm before a powerful scissor strike, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Shark Sentinel
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Speedily move through the enemy with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the character on the field is launched, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, enabling dashing movement.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions and release to stop.
Character is invulnerable briefly when triggering the skill.
Upon triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, Ellen gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect, shortening the charging time of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, lasting up to 5s or until it triggers once.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Wavefront Impact
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Shark Cruiser
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the attack to extend the skill duration.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>58.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>66.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>75%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>83.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>91.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors Strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.Name: Glacial Omen
1.Desc: Upon hitting an enemy with a Swift Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 3. Upon hitting an enemy with a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 6. For each <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> consumed, Ellen's CRIT Rate is increased by 2% for 15s, stacking up to 6 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
1.Desc2:
Chilling winds are an omen of winter, and a signal that Ellen is about to apply for extended leave to hibernate.
Speaking of which, do sharks actually need to hibernate?

2.Name: Arctic Ocean Predator
2.Desc: The 3rd hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color> can be directly followed up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Sharknami</color>. For each point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the current attack's CRIT DMG is increased by 20%, up to a max of 60%.
2.Desc2:
Despite being freshly stained with red, the massive shears held by Ellen lacked any trace of warmth.
The icy cold stems from her iron-forged instrument, as well as the fear of facing a predator such as herself.

3.Name: Overtime-Intolerant
3.Desc2:
The whole point of "efficiency" is being able to go home early and sleep.
So strike harder and strike faster.

4.Name: Endless Hoarfrost
4.Desc: Whenever a squad member <color=#98EFF0>Freezes</color> or Stuns an enemy, Ellen gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> and the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect. She also recovers 4 Energy. The Energy recovery effect can trigger once per 10s.
4.Desc2:
A relentless assault of piercing cold. Terrifying monstrosities will learn the beauty and cruelty of winter under Ellen's blade.
But, actually, the endless work that maids have during holidays is far more cruel...

5.Name: Adequate Sleep
5.Desc2:
Except for when in the toughest of battles, Ellen always seems to have that "I can fall asleep at any moment" look.
Many an enemy has met their demise after underestimating Ellen because of it.

6.Name: The Feast Begins
6.Desc: When Ellen uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or gains <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color>, her PEN Ratio increases by 20% for 6s. She also gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. With 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, using a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color> consumes all stacks, increasing the DMG of the current attack by 250%.
6.Desc2: An open wound, a drop of blood. A thrilling hunt, a grand feast. A fragile life, a moment of satisfaction.
